DataElement.preferredName: First Diarrhea Episode Current Cycle Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Date of first diarrhea episode in the current treatment cycle.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: First Diarrhea Current Therapy Cycle Episode
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree._Watery bowel movements._The name of the therapy that is currently being administered._An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence._A noteworthy happening that is distinctive in a series of related events.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:Watery bowel movements.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

Property.preferredDefinition: The name of the therapy that is currently being administered.:An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.:A noteworthy happening that is distinctive in a series of related events.

Concepts.definition: The name of the therapy that is currently being administered.
An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.
A noteworthy happening that is distinctive in a series of related events.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for MHRI GU IRB# 2015-0547: HALT-D protocol, Bowel Movement Endpoint form. 6/6/17 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.
